categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Shonnatrucks was a Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. The Jedi was stationed at the Valo Temple on the planet Valo. In preparation for the Republic Fair, which was to be hosted by the Galactic Republic in Lonisa City, Master Shonnatrucks, alongside Master Devo and the Padawans of the temple, greeted security forces that had been sent by the Republic.
